gui

Class UsefulMethods

  • java.lang.Object
    • gui.UsefulMethods

  • public class UsefulMethods
extends java.lang.Object
    Class UsefulMethods controls graphical users interface.

    Controller class in mvc pattern.

    Author:
    Erik Matoviè

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      UsefulMethods(User user, View view)
      Class constructor specifying which user is going to be a current logged in.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void exitProgram()
      Exit program when clicked.

      Get method to access view.
      void setButtons()
      Set method for Buttons - event handling, what each button will do, when clicked.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Detail

      • UsefulMethods

        public UsefulMethods(User user,
                     View view)
        Class constructor specifying which user is going to be a current logged in.

        Constructor works with object user as model and object view as view and UsefulMethods is a controller as in design pattern mvc. Variable firstRun is to determinate if program has its first run.

        Parameters:
        user - this user is going to be a current logged in
        view - object view to change what user sees

    • Method Detail

      • setButtons

        public void setButtons()
        Set method for Buttons - event handling, what each button will do, when clicked.

        Button buttonAccount shows info about user´s account when clicked.

        Button buttonLogIN is imitating security - you can log on with password as UserA or UserB.

        Button buttonDebitCard will set debit card for user if it is not already set.

        Button buttonTransferMoney will change scene to go to the menu for transferring the money when clicked.

        Button buttonUser will go back to the user´s menu when clicked.

        Button buttonLogOut will log out user and scene will go back to the main menu when clicked.

        Button buttonSendMoney will send money from one user to the second one when clicked.

      • exitProgram

        public void exitProgram()
        Exit program when clicked.

      • getView

        public View getView()
        Get method to access view.

        Encapsulation.

        Returns:
        object view
